citations.narrative:
Two adult red foxes are enclosed in an outdoor primary enclosure that lacks a perimeter fence on the East side of the
enclosure. There is a 4 foot public barrier on the East side but this species requires at least a 6 foot perimeter fence.
Perimeter fences are important to prevent contact or entry to the enclosure by predators and unauthorized persons. This
could potentially cause injury or illness to the animals.
The facility must have a perimeter fence appropriate for the species being housed or have an approved variance by the
Administrator.
To be corrected by: 19-September-2023
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the
applicant.
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspections or by 18-November-2023 or the applicant will forfeit the license
fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Re-License Inspection.
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires.
n

narrative:
3.127(d) 
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
Two adult red foxes are enclosed in an outdoor primary enclosure that lacks a perimeter fence on the East side of the 
enclosure. There is a 4 foot public barrier on the East side but this species requires at least a 6 foot perimeter fence. 
Perimeter fences are important to prevent contact or entry to the enclosure by predators and unauthorized persons. This 
could potentially cause injury or illness to the animals. 
The facility must have a perimeter fence appropriate for the species being housed or have an approved variance by the 
Administrator. 
To be corrected by: 19-September-2023 
 
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. 
 
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspections or by 18-November-2023 or the applicant will forfeit the license 
fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Re-License Inspection. 
 
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires. 
 
 n

species.common: RED FOX (INCLUDES SILVER FOX & CROSS FOX)
